name: Space Turret
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for TriJam #58 with the theme "0 Buttons".

In this game, you must kill the red enemies by aiming the turret with your mouse and shoot by clicking the mouse. You will get points if you kill an enemy.  

  I made this game using UnityEngine. For graphics/art assets i used Piskel. The soundtrack is made by Eric Skiff and the name of the soundtrack is "A Night Of Dizzy Spells".
